attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK Local Authorities should have the ability to determine the allocation of Government funding for substance misuse, in particular in dealing with the misuse of alcohol. Currently funding is ‘ring fenced’ for substance misuse issues with a specific priority focus on drug misuse , we feel it would better serve residents if councils and their partners were able to allocate funding based on local knowledge rather than centrally set targets. Please join us in our campaign to devolve responsibility to those best placed to ensure it is effective.
